string-array.name: v95
string-array.item: IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
ANNOUNCEMENT: Weekly builds will now commence, instead of nightlies as the base has finally stabilized.
Fix Google Search (Grey on Grey/Black on Black)
Update MMS link text color to a lighter shade of grey
Fix WhatsApp chat unsent icon/loading icon
Fix text colors for multi-SIM devices (When selecting SIM colors)
Expose Play Store colors for dm // colors
Fix Google Messenger\'s hardkey background and Group MMS Settings (Black on Black/White on White)
Clean up Setting\'s Styles in preparation for RRO Layers port - adding them into ROM specific named XML files
Fix Email Draft Edit Icon Pencil (White on White)
